short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: force a controller of a video on X to show up

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "X (Twitter) Show Volume Controller" fixes the issue that hovering the mouse over the volume icon doesn't give you the slider to adjust (like https://www.reddit.com/r/Twitter/comments/pxm7v0/issue_of_being_unable_to_use_the_volume_control/).
